mapper.select: SELECT QA.QA_NO, QA.Q_NO, QA.ANSWER_YN, QA.SECRET_YN, QA.TITLE, QA.REG_USER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(QA.REG_DT, '%Y-%M-%D') AS REG_DT FROM QA_INFO_A QA ORDER BY QA.Q_NO DESC, QA.ANSWER_YN
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA_INFO_A (QA_NO, Q_NO, ANSWER_YN, SECRET_YN, TITLE, CONTENTS, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT, CHG_USER_NO, CHG_DT) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(QA.QA_NO),0)+1 FROM QA_INFO_A QA), (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(QA.QA_NO),0)+1 FROM QA_INFO_A QA), 'N', #{secret_yn}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{reg_user_no}, NOW(), #{reg_user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE QA_INFO_A SET SECRET_YN = #{secret_yn}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_USER_NO = #{reg_user_no}, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE QA_NO = #{qa_no} AND ANSWER_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QA_INFO_A (QA_NO, Q_NO, ANSWER_YN, SECRET_YN, TITLE, CONTENTS, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, REG_USER_NO, REG_DT, CHG_USER_NO, CHG_DT) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(QA.QA_NO),0)+1 FROM QA_INFO_A QA), #{q_no}, 'Y', #{secret_yn}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{file_name}, #{file_path}, #{reg_user_no}, NOW(), #{reg_user_no}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE QA_INFO_A SET SECRET_YN = #{secret_yn}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_USER_NO = #{reg_user_no}, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE QA_NO = #{qa_no} AND ANSWER_YN = 'Y'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM QA_INFO_A WHERE QA_NO = #{qa_no} AND ANSWER_YN = 'Y'
